snippet: It is welcoming news that President Obama will expand one of four protected marine areas in the Pacific, an unparalleled wildlife habitat.
abstract: Editorial welcomes Pres Obama's decision to greatly expand Pacific Remote Islands Marine National Monument, one of four vast protected marine areas in Pacific Ocean created by Pres George W Bush; contends Americans should be thankful that presidents of both parties have had the foresight to protect these remote waters.
lead_paragraph: It is welcoming news that President Obama will expand one of four protected marine areas in the Pacific, an unparalleled wildlife habitat.

keywords.value: Pacific Remote Islands Marine National Monument
keywords.name: glocations
